reviews.review_msg: Prof Nancy was very very helpful and she's very knowledgeable! Even though her lecture was alil boring bcuz of her 'monotone' voice. I'd suggest you to go to her office hours. She provided clearer instruction and in-depth materials during office hours, compared to lecturer. Some of her midterms were quite hard but some were not! and study the text!
She's nice and sweet, but boring.  The material is dull and so are the lectures, but she's helpful and friendly.
lecture in monotone, talk very slowly => put ppl in sleep.
Well, at least she's nice.  I found the exams okay though.
what a mess...she's smart and nice and everything, but makes sure you check over her marking...bound to have some mistake aomewhere...and her lectures are so boring and informative
Don't let her friendly face fool you.  She is really evil........I thought she has no teaching ability whatsoever.......
the course itself was not hard, but she made it so confusing. the way she messed things up is not funny. waited for 2 weeks for her to email me back but she never did.

She didn't know how to teach student to answer the questions....Also the questions for the exams are vague...She is a bad teacher...Other ling prof will be better than her for sure...Anywa, don't take her....It is not that easy for her class....
Very easy mark.
She's very good at presenting information, but she can get so confused and quite a few mistakes. But I liked her eagerness and smarts.

Unclear, grading is extremely tough & not suitable for a course that is an Introduction. Goes more in depth than 220, but this guy manages to make his explanations vague and depth-less. Don't waste time with the text, lecture notes or office hours where if you have a h/w question he'll just claim he can't give answers & regurgitates stuff from lect
He's a bad prof, avoid his class if you can. He doesn't even know what he's teaching.
I found James to be a pretty good prof - if you keep up on readings and go to office hours when you have a question, doing okay on homework and exams is totally achievable.

Took 222 with him in Summer 2013. He made me despise everything that syntax was. After taking 322 with a good professor, I'm starting to love syntax, but James is probably one of the worst professors I have ever had. He has difficulty explaining concepts, reads off a pdf, and makes the class feel very unwelcoming and uncomfortable. Avoid.

Really nice and funny person, not to mention he's handsome! As a prof he isn't the best- confuses students. Worst textbook ever.  Basically you'll be teaching yourself everything. Assignments (can do them as a group)  are worth 40% and you have to work for them, not easy! His exams are whatever,  just make sure to study well.
He is a nice guy, but he is not a nice prof. Difficult to understand what he said.
Not easy. He didn't overly explain anything and expected you know everything in the book as well. Homework and test were really hard.

Keir is such a great professor. He is very clear with what he expects you know on tests and quizzes, and homeworks were never too tough, but if you had issues he always responded to emails quickly and is always at office hours. This class isn't easy but he makes you want to learn so it doesn't suck. I really hope I can take more classes with him.
id take his class again. great prof

His class was fantastic! He uses lots of examples and tries to make it all relatable. The textbook we used was a little contradictory but he's easily my favourite professor. His tests are a little difficult but he always takes the average into consideration for the next one so that it's not as hard. He wants us to learn and enjoy syntax, not fail.

Class is almost like a tutorial - lots of examples and exercises to help you get through the material. Assignments and tests are frequent, but fair and it makes you keep up with the material. He always makes sure to go over all the answers afterwards. Really approachable and helpful. Highly recommend taking courses with him.

Her grading scale is pretty high, but it is not that difficult to get a good grade in her syntax lecture as long as you do your homework and attend. Her lectures are not totally interesting but she is very helpful and understanding.

She is hard to understand and therefore hard to follow in lecture. Her lecture notes are decent, but her explanation of the material sucks. She definitely chooses favourites and she can be rude. I hate her as a person and loathe her as a prof

Nathalie is a poor instructor. Her respect for precision,accuracy, and consistency is notable insofar as it does not exist. I am a scholarship student, high GPA, etc., and have never been more dismayed at the quality of instruction. If she is the teacher for this course, take it another semester. She is simply unclear, and bad at her job.
very poor teaching skills..!!  totally unacceptable..!
No Comments
major communication problems..  both teaching and her accent
No Comments
Nice woman, but not that great as a prof. Take 200 before 220 with her.
Very difficult exams - great teacher, very enthusiastic and helpful
Never understood what she was trying to say...her Eng sunks!!!  Don't take her.
No Comments
brain drilling exams..!!  scary... =_=  never want to be in her class again!
No Comments
